import"core-js/modules/es.regexp.to-string.js";/*!
 * Copyright (c) Microsoft Corporation.
 * All rights reserved. See LICENSE in the project root for license information.
 */import url from'url';export const CmsHostMapping=['cms-eastus-ppe-imageresizer-mr.cloudapp.net'];export const getResizedImageUrl=(imageUrl,width,height)=>{const imgUrlParts=url.parse(imageUrl,true);const host=imgUrlParts.host;if(imgUrlParts&&host&&CmsHostMapping.indexOf(host)>-1){if(width){imgUrlParts.query.w=width.toString();}if(height){imgUrlParts.query.h=height.toString();}imgUrlParts.query.m='6';imageUrl=url.format(imgUrlParts);}return imageUrl;};
